MacroOp.Name: OMNI_DTOR_THROWS
MacroOp.Brief: A library helper defining the exception specifier of destructors.
MacroOp.Description: If OMNI_ENABLE_CXX or OMNI_ENABLE_NOEXCEPT is defined, the C++ @c noexcept(false) specifier is applied to any destructors that need the exception specifier applied.
MacroOp.Synopsis: A library macro helper that defines the exception specifier of destructors that could throw an exception.
